summary: Things I have learned from my tumblr friends
body:
Things I have learned from my tumblr friends

-I don’t sleep enough (or eat enough whoops)

-my life is very cliche filled (have that whole crush on my best friends brother thing going on(he’s exactly like Reed acts funny enough) and have a crush on a “bad boy” (the Reed-act alike) and a guy with the whole “boy next door” thing going on

-If tumblr was a school, I would have squad goals just saying (you guys know who you are, you may not know each other but-)

-people are easier to talk to online

-being a closeted bi person is a lot simpler online, because you don’t know them offline so you can be more open

-the best people are on tumblr

@petra-dragneel @a-bittersweet-gal @andi-shackk @ashontheoffbeat @kasuca (not entirely sure if the last one is completely mutual yet- but I consider Rowan a friend so-)

summary:
This convo in my math class with Andi Mack Characters
Amber(The teacher): Who’s speaker is that on top of the cabinet playing...
body:
This convo in my math class with Andi Mack Characters
Amber(The teacher): Who’s speaker is that on top of the cabinet playing christmas music?
Andi: It’s mine
Amber: Well turn it off, I can hear it down the hall
Cyrus: Why, everyone needs a little holiday cheer
Jonah: And people will think we’re the fun classroom, everyone will want to come in here
Buffy: Until they find out it’s geometry, then they gonna run
Tj: Wait, we have the option of running?
Buffy: I mean technically she can’t stop you, but you’d probably get in trouble
Marty: Yeet, let’s go
Amber: No!
Andi: *turns music back on* 
Everyone except Amber: *Starts singing Mariah Carey*
Amber: *muttering* I give up

summary: tell me this isn’t a jandi/wandi anthem “Now I'm the other man One of us stays, and the other one's leaving” “So now they saying...
body:
tell me this isn’t a jandi/wandi anthem

“Now I’m the other man
One of us stays, and the other one’s leaving”

“So now they saying I’m the other man
Huh?
You got me wondering where do I stand

And now I got these broken pieces in my hands now
You got me worried
I trip, trip, I’m tripping girl

You got me thinking, envisioning how we used to kick it
If when I’m missin’, you dissin’, you doin’ shady business
‘Cause with the distance, you distant, and I can feel the difference”

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NsNwurv2OZE

summary: Alternative Universe where actors Cyrus Goodman and Tyler James “TJ” Kippen, star together in a variety of romanic movies....
caption:
Alternative Universe where actors Cyrus Goodman and Tyler James “TJ” Kippen, star together in a variety of romanic movies.

Spoiler Alert: They begin dating after their 3rd movie.

Info about the movies down below!

After I Met You (Comedy | Fantasy | Romance)

Peter (Cyrus Goodman) meets the man of his dreams, literally. For months, he’s been dreaming about a nameless man, and now that man is standing right in front of him at the bakery where he works at. It’s safe to say Peter is quite losing his mind.

Elija (TJ Kippen) is a dreamwalker and for the most part that’s all he has ever been. A dream walker. Never gets involved in people’s dreams. That is, until he stumbles across part-timer-at-a-bakery-shop-trying-to-earn-his-degree-Peter Downton. 

A Lost Moment (Drama | Romance)

Henry (Cyrus Goodman) and Noah (TJ Kippen) have been together for seven blissful years. When Noah is about to finally pop the question, Noah is arrested for a crime he allegedly committed seven and a half years ago. Now it’s up to Henry to decided if Noah is truly the man he knows.

Fake Love (Comedy | Romance)

Andrew (Cyrus Goodman) and Ethan (TJ Kippen) work together at a travel agency company. They’re not necessarily friends, if anything they’re acquaintances at most.

However, Ethan wants to change that, which is why he goes and asks Andrew for dating advice. Except little does Andrew know that he’s not giving dating advice to win manger Mia (Amber Brown) over like Ethan supposedly says, but to win himself over.

Which one would you watch?

blog.name: lonely-lesbean-soup
blog.title: Welcome
blog.description: Mari - Just your average 17 y/o gay female who loves to ship

summary: Cyrus’ Day Out
title: Cyrus’ Day Out
body:
Hi so this is my first fanfic and not very good but I hope you like it. It’s a Tyrus oneshot. They’re aged up to 16 btw.

___________________________


It was a fairly windy day when Cyrus had decided to go to the National Museum of Natural History. Their school had a chance to take a week long trip to DC and after the first day of boring history lessons, they were free to roam in groups of three or more. So, because it was his turn to choose their daily excursion, he had rounded up Andi, Buffy, Marty, Jonah, and TJ and dragged them to the large white building.

“I’m serious guys, it’s so cool! Theres so many different exhibits and it’s free too,” he explained.

Andi, who was not too thrilled to be separated from her girlfriend stepped in. “I’m sure it is, but it’s a history museum, we spent all day yesterday learning about history! I’d rather just call Amber.”

Jonah ignored her comment and instead said, “Afterwards do you want to go to the Air and Space museum? It’s open until 6 today and I hear the planetarium is totally cool.”

Cyrus, now looking at his friend, now realized none looked too excited at the prospect of spending their day looking at fossils. “Actually, I kinda wanted to visit alone, you know, really take my time looking at everything in peace, so you all can go do your own thing and we’ll meet back here at 3. Does that sound good?”

“You sure, Underdog?”

Cyrus looked at TJ in the eyes for a moment and smiled. “Yeah, totally.”

And soon enough, he was alone again. TJ joined Buffy and Marty in their race to see all the monuments, Andi went to the Renwick while FaceTiming Amber, and Jonah went to the Air and Space Museum to see the movies in the planetarium. So, checking through security and taking out his camera, Cyrus entered the building with a little bit of sadness but mostly excitement.

He decided to go from bottom to top so as he walked past the wooly mammoth he descended the stairs to look at the bird exhibit. It made him slightly uncomfortable seeing all the stuffed birds, but nevertheless it was fascinating. As he approached the main floor which he had entered on, he was met with many choices for exploration. Seeing as the dinosaur exhibit was crowded, he decided to save that for last and entered the Mammal exhibit.

Like the birds, seeing so many stuffed animals was slightly uncomfortable but it was still neat. He even got to watch a short video on the Morganucodon (not minding it was a video aimed at younger audiences) which explained the evolution of modern mammals from that small shrew-like creature. Then he moved to the Ocean exhibit, their was giant skeletons of prehistoric aquatic animals and even the jaw of a megalodon which was an ancient shark that was over two times the size of a great white, and could fit a family of five people whole in it’s mouth.

Then he was lead to the human exhibit, he walked through this cool light tunnel that showed all previous variations of human that lead up to homosapiens. He saw a cool culture exhibit, looked at different human forms, saw an exhibit on disease, where he played an intriguing game on keeping a civilization alive, and even went into this machine that reverted his face to what he would look like if he was a homogeneous instead of a homosapien.

By the end of the first couple of hours, he forgot about his disappointment that he wasn’t with his friends. Although, he really thought at least TJ would join him, but maybe that was just wishful thinking. TJ is straight. He’s just your friend. He doesn’t have to have the same interests in you. He sighed and stood back up, starting towards the ice age exhibit.

Eventually, after skimming through there, he reached a much less crowded Dinosaur exhibit. It had just recently been re-opened in the June of 2019 and had many more dinosaur skeletons added to it. In the center was a Tyrannosaurus rex fighting a Triceratops, which was interesting enough and attracted most of the viewers, but he found himself climbing the stairs to see the hanging exhibit that circled the room.  At first he enjoyed it because he could see all the new and old dinosaurs on the ground floor such as the brachiosaurus and the ankylosaurus, but then the sight of the hanging pteranodon caught his eye.

“Although it’s not an actual dinosaur it’s quite magnificent isn’t it?”

Cyrus jumped at the voice. “Uh… hi?”

A girl who looked to be about sixteen, the same age as him, smiled. She had long brown hair and bright blue eyes and didn’t seem to have anyone with her either. “Sorry, hi! I’m Jo. I just had seen you a couple of times at the other exhibits and because I’m here by myself too I thought we could accompany each other.”

Cyrus’ hesitation reduced. “Hi, I’m Cyrus. All my friends don’t really like this stuff so I came on my own.”

Jo laughed. “Me too, usually I would’ve dragged my girlfriend along with me but she gets embarrassed every time I flip off the Whitehouse because Trump’s an asshole.”

He smiled brightly. “Yeah I get what you mean. So actually I’m meeting my friends in about two hours, but if you want to walk around with me I’d love to have someone to talk about dinosaurs with.”

And with that, they continued on, testing each other’s knowledge on the most obscure facts about dinosaurs.

—

~3:15~

TJ was undeniably stressed. He paced back and forth in front of the steps where his equally as stressed friends sat.

“It’s 3:15, he was supposed to be here 15 minutes ago. Where is he?”

“We know TJ,” Buffy said, slightly irritated. “Let’s go look for him, we can call over the intercom at the lost child center. If he still doesn’t come we’ll split up and search.”

It was not ten minutes later that TJ was relieved as he saw Cyrus approaching the group with a huge smile. He ran up to him and gave him a hug. “Thank god underdog, you’re safe.”

Each friend then took a turn to embrace Cyrus. In a big city like DC with a innocent person like Cyrus, they immediately assumed the worst.

Dread soon returned to TJ though, when Cyrus smiled at the girl next to him. She was smiling at him in a way that just didn’t sit right. She then leaned over and whispered into Cyrus’ ear, making him blush, before handing him a paper and walking off, waving over her head.

“Who was that?” Jonah asked.

“Her name’s Jo. We ran into each other and started talking about dinosaurs. Sorry I’m late.” He said, faint smile on his lips. “So did you all have fun?”

They fell into an easy conversation about the day but TJ remained quiet. He thought he was finally getting somewhere with Cyrus but that girl Jo…

—

~8:30~

Cyrus and TJ sat outside on the hotel balcony while the rest of their friends played poker inside.

Cyrus broke the silence after a moment, concerned. “So what’s wrong?”

“I don’t know what you’re talking about. I’m fine.”

“Teej…”

“Just I don’t like how that girl Jo was flirting with you.” He quickly snapped his mouth shut, he wasn’t supposed to say that.

“TJ. She wasn’t flirting. She’s bi and has a girlfriend. Why does it matter anyways?”

TJ ignored the question. “So what did she whisper to you? What made you blush? Why- Why were you so focused on her that you couldn’t meet m- us? We were so worried!”

“Is that what this is about? I swear TJ, I was just excited to have a new friend that loved dinosaurs as much as I do, it’s rare to find them. And well— what she whispered was—,“ his face turned red. “She said she had a season pass to the zoo that could bring 3 guests. Tomorrow she said she’d bring her girlfriend and asked me to, to come with my boyfriend.”

His heart dropped. Cyrus. Has. A. Boyfriend. “Y-you’re boyfriend?”

If Cyrus’ face got any redder, TJ was sure he’d pass out. “Well— you see— the second part of that was for me to ask the boy I like out.”

“O-oh. Okay. I’ll let you go then.”

“What? No! TJ— Er— SowouldyoupleasegooutwithmeTJbecauseIreallylikeyoubutIunderstandifyoudon’tlikemesodon’tfeelobligated?”

“What.”

Cyrus inhaled deeply. “I said: So would you please go out with me TJ because I really like you but I understand if you don’t like me so don’t feel obligated?”

At this point TJ was also deep red in color. “I— yes? I like you too!”

“Cool!”

“Cool.

“So… are we boyfriends?”

“Yes.”

“Cool.”

“Can I kiss you?”

“Uhh. Sure.”

TJ, shocked at the fact that Cyrus actually said yes to the kiss, leaned in too quickly and mashed their faces together roughly before springing away not a second later.

Awkward? Yep. Sparks? Definitely.

And right then, they knew they’d be together for a long, long time.

reblog.comment:
Hi so this is my first fanfic and not very good but I hope you like it. It’s a Tyrus oneshot. They’re aged up to 16 btw.

___________________________


It was a fairly windy day when Cyrus had decided to go to the National Museum of Natural History. Their school had a chance to take a week long trip to DC and after the first day of boring history lessons, they were free to roam in groups of three or more. So, because it was his turn to choose their daily excursion, he had rounded up Andi, Buffy, Marty, Jonah, and TJ and dragged them to the large white building.

“I’m serious guys, it’s so cool! Theres so many different exhibits and it’s free too,” he explained.

Andi, who was not too thrilled to be separated from her girlfriend stepped in. “I’m sure it is, but it’s a history museum, we spent all day yesterday learning about history! I’d rather just call Amber.”

Jonah ignored her comment and instead said, “Afterwards do you want to go to the Air and Space museum? It’s open until 6 today and I hear the planetarium is totally cool.”

Cyrus, now looking at his friend, now realized none looked too excited at the prospect of spending their day looking at fossils. “Actually, I kinda wanted to visit alone, you know, really take my time looking at everything in peace, so you all can go do your own thing and we’ll meet back here at 3. Does that sound good?”

“You sure, Underdog?”

Cyrus looked at TJ in the eyes for a moment and smiled. “Yeah, totally.”

And soon enough, he was alone again. TJ joined Buffy and Marty in their race to see all the monuments, Andi went to the Renwick while FaceTiming Amber, and Jonah went to the Air and Space Museum to see the movies in the planetarium. So, checking through security and taking out his camera, Cyrus entered the building with a little bit of sadness but mostly excitement.

He decided to go from bottom to top so as he walked past the wooly mammoth he descended the stairs to look at the bird exhibit. It made him slightly uncomfortable seeing all the stuffed birds, but nevertheless it was fascinating. As he approached the main floor which he had entered on, he was met with many choices for exploration. Seeing as the dinosaur exhibit was crowded, he decided to save that for last and entered the Mammal exhibit.

Like the birds, seeing so many stuffed animals was slightly uncomfortable but it was still neat. He even got to watch a short video on the Morganucodon (not minding it was a video aimed at younger audiences) which explained the evolution of modern mammals from that small shrew-like creature. Then he moved to the Ocean exhibit, their was giant skeletons of prehistoric aquatic animals and even the jaw of a megalodon which was an ancient shark that was over two times the size of a great white, and could fit a family of five people whole in it’s mouth.

Then he was lead to the human exhibit, he walked through this cool light tunnel that showed all previous variations of human that lead up to homosapiens. He saw a cool culture exhibit, looked at different human forms, saw an exhibit on disease, where he played an intriguing game on keeping a civilization alive, and even went into this machine that reverted his face to what he would look like if he was a homogeneous instead of a homosapien.

By the end of the first couple of hours, he forgot about his disappointment that he wasn’t with his friends. Although, he really thought at least TJ would join him, but maybe that was just wishful thinking. TJ is straight. He’s just your friend. He doesn’t have to have the same interests in you. He sighed and stood back up, starting towards the ice age exhibit.

Eventually, after skimming through there, he reached a much less crowded Dinosaur exhibit. It had just recently been re-opened in the June of 2019 and had many more dinosaur skeletons added to it. In the center was a Tyrannosaurus rex fighting a Triceratops, which was interesting enough and attracted most of the viewers, but he found himself climbing the stairs to see the hanging exhibit that circled the room.  At first he enjoyed it because he could see all the new and old dinosaurs on the ground floor such as the brachiosaurus and the ankylosaurus, but then the sight of the hanging pteranodon caught his eye.

“Although it’s not an actual dinosaur it’s quite magnificent isn’t it?”

Cyrus jumped at the voice. “Uh… hi?”

A girl who looked to be about sixteen, the same age as him, smiled. She had long brown hair and bright blue eyes and didn’t seem to have anyone with her either. “Sorry, hi! I’m Jo. I just had seen you a couple of times at the other exhibits and because I’m here by myself too I thought we could accompany each other.”

Cyrus’ hesitation reduced. “Hi, I’m Cyrus. All my friends don’t really like this stuff so I came on my own.”

Jo laughed. “Me too, usually I would’ve dragged my girlfriend along with me but she gets embarrassed every time I flip off the Whitehouse because Trump’s an asshole.”

He smiled brightly. “Yeah I get what you mean. So actually I’m meeting my friends in about two hours, but if you want to walk around with me I’d love to have someone to talk about dinosaurs with.”

And with that, they continued on, testing each other’s knowledge on the most obscure facts about dinosaurs.

—

~3:15~

TJ was undeniably stressed. He paced back and forth in front of the steps where his equally as stressed friends sat.

“It’s 3:15, he was supposed to be here 15 minutes ago. Where is he?”

“We know TJ,” Buffy said, slightly irritated. “Let’s go look for him, we can call over the intercom at the lost child center. If he still doesn’t come we’ll split up and search.”

It was not ten minutes later that TJ was relieved as he saw Cyrus approaching the group with a huge smile. He ran up to him and gave him a hug. “Thank god underdog, you’re safe.”

Each friend then took a turn to embrace Cyrus. In a big city like DC with a innocent person like Cyrus, they immediately assumed the worst.

Dread soon returned to TJ though, when Cyrus smiled at the girl next to him. She was smiling at him in a way that just didn’t sit right. She then leaned over and whispered into Cyrus’ ear, making him blush, before handing him a paper and walking off, waving over her head.

“Who was that?” Jonah asked.

“Her name’s Jo. We ran into each other and started talking about dinosaurs. Sorry I’m late.” He said, faint smile on his lips. “So did you all have fun?”

They fell into an easy conversation about the day but TJ remained quiet. He thought he was finally getting somewhere with Cyrus but that girl Jo…

—

~8:30~

Cyrus and TJ sat outside on the hotel balcony while the rest of their friends played poker inside.

Cyrus broke the silence after a moment, concerned. “So what’s wrong?”

“I don’t know what you’re talking about. I’m fine.”

“Teej…”

“Just I don’t like how that girl Jo was flirting with you.” He quickly snapped his mouth shut, he wasn’t supposed to say that.

“TJ. She wasn’t flirting. She’s bi and has a girlfriend. Why does it matter anyways?”

TJ ignored the question. “So what did she whisper to you? What made you blush? Why- Why were you so focused on her that you couldn’t meet m- us? We were so worried!”

“Is that what this is about? I swear TJ, I was just excited to have a new friend that loved dinosaurs as much as I do, it’s rare to find them. And well— what she whispered was—,“ his face turned red. “She said she had a season pass to the zoo that could bring 3 guests. Tomorrow she said she’d bring her girlfriend and asked me to, to come with my boyfriend.”

His heart dropped. Cyrus. Has. A. Boyfriend. “Y-you’re boyfriend?”

If Cyrus’ face got any redder, TJ was sure he’d pass out. “Well— you see— the second part of that was for me to ask the boy I like out.”

“O-oh. Okay. I’ll let you go then.”

“What? No! TJ— Er— SowouldyoupleasegooutwithmeTJbecauseIreallylikeyoubutIunderstandifyoudon’tlikemesodon’tfeelobligated?”

“What.”

Cyrus inhaled deeply. “I said: So would you please go out with me TJ because I really like you but I understand if you don’t like me so don’t feel obligated?”

At this point TJ was also deep red in color. “I— yes? I like you too!”

“Cool!”

“Cool.

“So… are we boyfriends?”

“Yes.”

“Cool.”

“Can I kiss you?”

“Uhh. Sure.”

TJ, shocked at the fact that Cyrus actually said yes to the kiss, leaned in too quickly and mashed their faces together roughly before springing away not a second later.

Awkward? Yep. Sparks? Definitely.

And right then, they knew they’d be together for a long, long time.

summary: Are They Friends?
title: Are They Friends?
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2E0YmLa

by Seraph_Novak

Fic request ~ Marty finds out that TJ and Cyrus are dating.

Words: 663, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 33 of Tyrus One-Shots

  • Fandoms: Andi Mack (TV)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M

summary: ok this is the opening for my semester project in english, please give me correction if you can! :) The Walt Disney Corporation...
body:
ok this is the opening for my semester project in english, please give me correction if you can! :)

The Walt Disney Corporation is the second biggest network in the world, which holds a big, diverse audience.

Every couple of years, Disney produces a groundbreaking TV show, for example, “Lizzie McGuire” (2001) and “That’s so raven” (2003). Moreover, on  April 7, 2016, a new series from the creator of “Lizzie McGuire” was premiered. The series touched on many important topics such as gun control, Asian culture, Jewish culture (more exclusively, bar mitzvah’s), teen pregnancy, anxiety, toxic relationships, dress code, military families, a gay storyline and more will be produced.
As on November 27th, 2018, Disney holds an opportunity of giving a Jewish, gay teen a boyfriend. However, will Disney take the easy way out and will just leave it as subtext? Alternatively, will they take a leap of faith and go forward with this storyline?
As a person and an activist, I find myself obligated to try to get a good representation for all groups in society. I feel like it is necessary to encourage a change, especially in such big media like Disney channel. Showing kids that it is okay to have a partner from the same gender and loving the same gender doesn’t affect your personality.
The preparation for this storyline was incredible and showed a beneficial relationship which helped both boys develop and become a better version of themselves and brought them closer together, even gaining them an important storyline (gun control). I truly do want to see them both having a romantic relationship because it shows kids and teens that gay relationship can be as good as a heterosexual one. But the main question is, will Disney relay on their ratings (which is fairly low, as opposed to other seasons) to keep this show going even after getting backlash for having a gay relationship in a “kid show”?
